com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.rings
Class RingsDataAdapter

java.lang.Object
  com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.rings.RingsDataAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
threeD.raytracer.primitives.Mesh.VertexData
public class RingsDataAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements threeD.raytracer.primitives.Mesh.VertexData

First attempt at an adaptor for the data I currently have in buffers to Rings format, avoiding a copy of the entire mesh

Version:
$Id: RingsDataAdapter.java,v 1.6 2006/07/06 06:59:43 martin Exp $
Author:
martin
